projects.name: Air Quality Monitoring System
projects.description: The project was built using Sensors, Microcontrollers and connectivity modules. The project provides up-to-date information on air quality, Users can access data from anywhere, easily deployable.

projects.name: Smart City Project
projects.description: (work in progress) Developing a project using Java and IOT devices to improve city services and enhance the quality of life for citizens. Enhance sustainability and reduce energy consumption ,reduce traffic congestion and operational cost by optimizing traffic flow and waste collection.

experiences.description: Developed custom applications on the Salesforce platform using Apex and Visualforce. Optimized Salesforce performance by 30% through efficient coding and query optimization. Understand the main tasks that a Salesforce developer is responsible for, including customizing the Salesforce Platform using lowcode tools and developing user stories.

Collaboration with Teams: Working with data scientists, analysts, and other engineers to support data needs for projects. Documentation: Maintaining documentation related to data processes and pipelines. Data Collection and Integration: Assisting in collecting data from different sources and integrating it into a centralized data warehouse or data lake.
